pages.text: $(li)The Lure enchantment can be applied in any kind of Fishing Rod.$(br)$(li)This enchantment decreases the amount of time needed for a fish to bite the hook.$(br)$(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.
pages.title: Lure

pages.text: $(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Lure).
